column4: Hey I am having a problem with my ATI card I was wondering if someone could help me?
Can anyone help me with my ATI card problem?
I have gutsy and a Radeon TV 200 QW [Radeon 7500] card when I try using it I get a black screen after the ubuntu loading screen
if I edit my xorg.conf file like the forums say it boots but it only boots in terminal mode or whatever
when I try editing the xorg.conf file I get terminal but no graphics
Make sure you set v/h rates for your monitor not just a base sync rate in that xorg
sudo apt-get install pastebinit  && cat /etc/X11/xorg.conf | pastebinit   in a term
it pastes your xorg into a pastebin and gives you a link to give people that are helping you
Yes.. sorry.. I cant remember which box has the 7500..
it looks like you edited that xorg of yours manually..
lspci | grep -i vga should show you the right pci port for setting up the video card in your xorg
I am trying one other computer to see if it has the 7500
